name: 尤斯图斯·冯·李比希
bio_short: 德国化学家，被誉为“有机化学之父”之一，也是“农业化学”的创始人。他与维勒（Wöhler）共同提出了“自由基理论”（`wohler_liebig_radical_theory_1832`），并发明了“氮肥”（Nitrogen-based fertilizer）。
bio_short_en: A German chemist, one of the 'fathers of organic chemistry' and the founder of 'agricultural chemistry'. He co-developed 'Radical Theory' with Wöhler (`wohler_liebig_radical_theory_1832`) and invented nitrogen-based fertilizer.
